A2: Synthesis of ( E)-3-(3″-chlorophenyl)-1-[4′-(trifluoromethyl)phenyl]prop-2-en-1-one: Yield: 90%; m.p. 68 °C; R
f = 0.8 (30% Ethyl acetate in Hexane); FT-IR (KBr, cm −1): 1651 (C=O), 1611 (C=C Ar), 1507 (CH=CH), 1252 (-CF 3), 3010 (Ar C-H stretching), 846 (C-Cl); 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3, ppm), δ: 7.77 (1H, d, J = 16.3 Hz CO-CH=), 8.11 (1H, d, J = 16.2 Hz, Ar-CH=), 8.12–8.22 (4H, m, C-2′, 3′, 5′, 6′, Ar-H), 7.09–7.74 (4H, m, C-3″, 4″, 5″, 6″, Ar-H); ESI-MS: 311.13 [M + H] +.
